body:
> anyone got an idea why circle ci is failing on this?

The mock recipe server scripts loop through actions/recipes/etc. returned by the API and rewrite fields they known to have URLs to correct the domain name used. They assume that the APIs return lists, but this PR adds pagination, so they return objects now instead. They'll need to be updated to deal with that, and potentially to fetch all the items necessary instead of a single page of items.

This might be a sign that APIs that the system add-on hits are now being paginated, and we need to either update the client to deal with that, or make pagination optional and opt-in. Have we tested this PR against the system add-on yet?
